title: Pokemon x/y
body:
I have a code for shiny mega gengar if anyone wants it? comes level 25 with shadowball/sludge wave/confuse ray/astonish

Will help you get it to omega ruby/sapphire if you need

replies.body: Hmm tempting but ceebs turning on my DS
I'm interested? How many virgins will it cost me?

> I'm interested? How many virgins will it cost me?

add me in-game my good friend we'll discuss prices of virgins there x o
Lol, what a beta. Gen 1 or nothing.
